channel.title: [updated] Congratulations to our newest moderators: `Rich and SilentCJ!
channel.description:
We are announcing two new members of staff: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=175141]`Rich[/url] and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=259364]SilentCJ[/url]
Both are our newest MoparScape moderators. Wish them luck as they help us make MoparScape a better place!
-MoparScape and Moparisthebest Staff
